I'd highly recommend "Batman & Robin" if you're in the mood for a classic blockbuster! This action-packed film stars George Clooney as Batman and Uma Thurman as Poison Ivy, offering an entertaining mix of superheroes, villains, and suspense.

Alternatively, "Hitch" is another great choice. This romantic comedy-drama stars Will Smith as a professional dating guru who helps others find love while struggling to win the heart of his own dream woman. It's a delightful movie that combines humor, romance, and a unique twist on the mentor-student dynamic. Enjoy!
